001package imagingbook.test;
002
003import org.apache.commons.math3.ml.distance.EarthMoversDistance;
004
005public class EarthMoversDistanceTest {
006        
007        static double[] A = {0,0,1,2,3,4};
008        static double[] B = {0,1,2,3,4,0};
009
010        public static void main(String[] args) {
011                EarthMoversDistance emd = new EarthMoversDistance();
012                double dist = emd.compute(A, B);
013                System.out.println("dist = " + dist);
014        }
015
016}
